member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC
member.summary: Describes a raytracing hit group state subobject that can be included in a state object.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC.HitGroupExport
member.summary: The name of the hit group.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC.Type
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying the type of the hit group.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC.AnyHitShaderImport
member.summary: Optional name of the any-hit shader associated with the hit group. This field can be used with all hit group types.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC.ClosestHitShaderImport
member.summary: Optional name of the closest-hit shader associated with the hit group. This field can be used with all hit group types.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_DESC.IntersectionShaderImport
member.summary: Optional name of the intersection shader associated with the hit group. This field can only be used with hit groups of type procedural primitive.
